p: TBME was used as solvent extraction. For strips, viable epidermis and dermis, 3, 1.5 and 2.5 ml were used, respectively. Viable epidermis and dermis were extracted with back and force agitation for 21 hours whereas strips were extracted for 1 hours only. 1 ml receptor fluid and washing were extracted with 2 ml TBME and shaked for 1 hour. All samples were stored at −80 °C before analysis.
